keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Diplomats from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe interviewed the two men in a hospital in Kiev. Russia has denied they are active duty soldiers.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Ukraine: Envoys Talk to Captives
headline.main: 2 Men Captured in Ukraine Admit to Being Russian Soldiers, Monitoring Group Says

snippet: Diplomats from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe interviewed the two men in a hospital in Kiev. Russia has denied they are active duty soldiers.
abstract: Report by Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe confirms Ukrainian government's assertion that Russian military is fighting in eastern Ukraine, allegation Russian Defense Ministry denies.
